skeleton.internetExplorer: Rouverpa does not support Internet Explorer. Please download a modern browser such as Google Chrome or Firefox.

cookies.title: The Rouverpa team is ready for you.
cookies.message: To improve Rouverpa, we use analytical cookies to keep statistics. Don't worry, we don't collect personal data, and the data that is collected is anonymized. For example, we look at which pages are visited the most.

SEO.title: Gift wrapping & printed labels
SEO.description: Rouverpa is already more than 30 years specialized in producing gift wrapping service and printed labels. Our customers are located in the flower sector, chocolate sector, etc.

about.title: More about us,
about.intro: Rouverpa is already more than 30 years specialized in producing gift wrapping service and printed labels. Our customers are located in the flower sector, chocolate sector, etc.
about.story: Geert Dâ€™hondt & Caroline Desmet use their passion and experience to produce high-quality products. At Rouverpa, the customer stands central and thanks to its own production line, it can make products tailored to the customer. In addition, the extensive product range ensures that the wishes of the customer are fulfilled. The internal delivery service guarantees punctual deliveries at any time. For further questions
about.storyLink: call us or send us an email.

caroline.name: Caroline Desmet
caroline.title: Manager
caroline.function: Manager responsible for printed labels and ribbons

interested.title: Interested?
interested.message: You can always reach out to us. We are willing to help people at any time. Go to our contact page to request a quotation without obligation, or to ask another question.
